sections.name: Abstract
sections.text: We propose a fixed-computation system that exhibits statistical learning phenomena. We show significant improvement on tasks.

sections.name: Introduction
sections.text: Our contributions are as follows. We position our work against prior art and claim novelty in the approach.

sections.name: Related Work
sections.text: Prior work studies plasticity and computation. Our approach differs by avoiding weight updates entirely.

sections.name: Methods
sections.text: We describe the architecture, training, loss, and optimization. Hyperparameters are provided in Appendix A.

sections.name: Results
sections.text: Our results indicate improvements. Figure 2 and Table 2 summarize metrics. Ablation study provided.

sections.name: Discussion
sections.text: We discuss implications, limitations, and societal impact.

sections.name: Conclusion
sections.text: We conclude and outline future work.

sections.name: Appendix
sections.text: Appendix A lists seeds and hyperparameters. Appendix B shows confidence intervals.
